title: New Video !!

replies.body: I don't even think this vid is allowed to be on the forums, it has nothing to do with Avicus or any avicus players involved. Im saying that because 1v1 videos with avicus players are fine, but not this video

replies.body: Please do not post videos of other servers on the forums.
replies.body_tagged: Please do not post videos of other servers on the forums.

replies.body:
Yeah, sorry man, but its true, you really can't post videos that isn't the Avicus server... You gotta read the rules for the Media section :/
If its a video thats not quite related then put it in Off Topic, but other servers is like de-promoting Avicus!
replies.body_tagged:
Yeah, sorry man, but its true, you really can't post videos that isn't the Avicus server... You gotta read the rules for the Media section :/
If its a video thats not quite related then put it in Off Topic, but other servers is like de-promoting Avicus!

replies.body:
"When posting the media category, make sure you are sharing content that directly related to the Avicus Network. Livestreaming matches, PVP montages, screenshots from in game, etc. You may share your media channels given they have content from Avicus Network"

Sorry, but since this video isn't Avicus related, it doesn't belong here.

@vlad by the way, the song is called "Take a Walk" by Passion Pit, but the song that you heard in the video is a remix. Youtube took it down. :/
